item.title: External validation of a Cox prognostic model
item.description: This blog shows how to externally validate a Cox regression prognostic model according to all steps in the paper of Royston & Altman. R code available.

item.title: Steps to externally validate a prediction model
item.description: External validation means that the performance of a prediction model is studied in a new (external) patient dataset that is not used to develop the model. It is important to use the correct predicted probabilities to evaluate if the external validation of the model is successful!
